message: Greetings! I have a fantastic product for you, a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity. It's valued at a cool $4000000, but I'm offering it to you for a mere $1000000. It's a steal, I know! Don't miss this chance to acquire a product with immense potential. What do you say?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While the price is tempting, I'm hesitant to buy without any previous sales data to gauge the quality of your products. Perhaps I'll revisit this after a few other buyers have made their decisions and I can see the track record.

Hello! I have a product available for you, priced at $1000000. It's a unique item with high potential value. While I'm new to this platform, I'm confident in the quality of my offerings. Feel free to ask any questions you may have. I'm eager to make a deal!

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your confidence, I'm hesitant to purchase without any information about the product's quality. Given the high price and unknown quality, I'd prefer to wait and see how your other products perform.  Please let me know if you're willing to share any details about the quality of previous products.

Thank you for the offer and the guarantee. I appreciate your transparency and willingness to address my concerns.
